ServiceSid.description: The SID of the [Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/api/chat/rest/services) to update the resource from.

Sid.description: The Twilio-provided string that uniquely identifies the Role resource to update.

Permission.description: A permission that you grant to the role. Only one permission can be granted per parameter. To assign more than one permission, repeat this parameter for each permission value. The values for this parameter depend on the role's `type` and are described in the documentation.

$ul: **account_sid**: The SID of the [Account](https://www.twilio.com/docs/api/rest/account) that created the Role resource.
**date_created**: The date and time in GMT when the resource was created specified in [RFC 2822](http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2822.txt) format.
**date_updated**: The date and time in GMT when the resource was last updated specified in [RFC 2822](http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2822.txt) format.
**friendly_name**: The string that you assigned to describe the resource.
**permissions**: An array of the permissions the role has been granted, formatted as a JSON string.
**service_sid**: The SID of the [Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/api/chat/rest/services) the resource is associated with.
**sid**: The unique string that we created to identify the Role resource.
**url**: The absolute URL of the Role resource.
